title: Beautiful Mercer Island Penthouse! Live and Virtual Tours Available!
posting_body: The Mercer Apartment Homes is the jewel of Mercer Island.
From the sparkling waters of our heated year round pool, to the soaring ceilings that go up to 20ft high, and everything in between, The Mercer is the whole package.
Whether you prefer the contemporary, urban designs of the Mercer West building, or the warm classic design of the East Building, we've got it.
Get your heart rate up in our fitness center, and relax in the dry sauna after.
Get to know your neighbors at our monthly community events, or go out on the town to Seattle or Bellevue, both just right across the bridge!
Come down to The Mercer and see for yourself!
Visit This Website to See More:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 2072 Sq.
- Plank Wood Style Flooring in select homes
- Central A/C & Heating in Every Residence
- Pre-Wired for High Speed Internet up to 1000 Mbps
- Cherry wood, Black and Tan cabinetry
- All-Concrete Building for Enhanced Sound Insulation
- State of the Art Fitness Center
- Designated Dog Run - Pets are welcome!
Our homes accommodate two pets per home.
Additional deposits and breed restrictions apply.
For more information please call today.
Take the Island Crest Way exit off of I-90, and find our building next to Chevron, kitty corner to the Walgreens.
